metadata.title: CVE-2024-8394 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Undergoing Certification (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When aborting the verification of an OTR chat session, an attacker could have caused a use-after-free bugleading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 128.2

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
